items: Gold swirl earrings with pearl center
Black and White Floral Print Scarf
baseline.styling_notes: Tuck the white ruffled shirt into the white wide-leg pants. Drape the black and white floral print scarf around the neck loosely for a relaxed look. Let the earrings be the focal point by styling the hair back. Keep the pants outside the cowboy boots for a clean look.
baseline.why_it_works: This outfit is perfect for an outdoor wedding because it balances classic elegance with playful touches, suitable for an afternoon event. The lightweight fabrics in the pants and shirt ensure breathability in warm weather, while the scarf can be removed if it gets too hot. The wide-leg pants and cowboy boots add a relaxed, playful vibe, while the shirt and earrings maintain classic elegance.

The necklace and scarf add intentional detailing, enhancing the outfit's playful and chic elements.
